评论详情: Cool wallet and people always ask me questions about it.

评论概述: Good but doesn’t live up to warranty
评论详情: The lifetime warranty for this product doesn’t cover "normal wear and tear" so this is what happens after about three years (see pictures). The sail cloth at the fold becomes brittle and eventually cracks up leaving holes. My husband loves these wallets so I’ve purchased him a third one. They are light weight, compact and cool looking but let’s get real, that warranty is fluff.

评论概述: Awesome Minimalist Wallet, Super Durable, Excellent Capacity
评论详情: I received this wallet as a gift (off of a wish list I had made) for Christmas of 2023 and have been using this wallet daily for over a year at this point. I am beyond pleased with how well this has held up.  Key features I was searching for when I discovered this company was thin material (no bulk), high capacity, if needed, and durability. This wallet checks all those boxes and looks pretty rad while doing so. I carry anywhere from 8 to 12 ID's/credit cards at any given time and the thin material keeps this from being bulky in my front pocket.  After a year, there is no signs of any failure of the materials, only some slight wear that one would expect. I anticipate that I will go another year plus without issues. I thought the price point seemed a bit high when I first discovered this, but I think it is well worth it. I am contemplating purchasing a back-up, so when I eventually wear this out, I can be certain that I will have a replacement.  If you have been looking at this wallet, but just not sure, don't hesitate, I did for months (mostly because I am cheap), but I am so glad I have this in my pocket.

Who designed this? Lol I assumed there would be a snap or tab to hold it closed. There isn't. I wanted an XPac/sailcloth wallet since it's the "in fabric" right now and I wanted to test its durability. But it won't be with a wallet where everything just falls out. What a complete F minus from this company.

评论概述: Just got my second after 10 years
评论详情: Bought my first one (top, black) in Hatteras around 2011 and wife gave me a new one (bottom, white) for Christmas 2021. Love it. Not only do they last, they're thin and light.

Made in USA, waterproof and  indestructible. Just enough for most guys, holds about 8 cards and some cash. My old wallets would get dirty and wet, nothing sticks to this it's made of plastic. I bought a bright blue one that way I can find it when it's under the car seat.

Love it. Grateful it's bright colored because it's so slim it would get list lost in my bag otherwise. No bells & whistles, just a couple card slots and a place to put cash.  Edited 3.5 years later to add that I'm still using this wallet, and that it looks exactly like it did the day I got it after 3.5 years of use.

评论概述: Super durable, thin and it's made from recycled material!
评论详情: Great wallet, very slim and durable, I've had it over a year and it's in perfect condition! I always get compliments on it and it's recycled!Edit: I have had the wallet over 3 years and it is still in good as new shape!  I only carry an ID and my only credit card and Costco card.  If you are someone who has 20 credit cards this won't be for you.

I bought this wallet as a quick replacement for an expensive leather one I lost while sailing (don't bring your wallet on a 13 foot boat!).  It so much thinner and lighter that I think it will be my wallet for a while.  I can keep cash, license, some credit cards, and a couple other ID cards before it gets too full.  I did have to move some "backup" cards and papers to my briefcase.  I can't rate durability yet, but the laminated plastic material (mylar polyester?) seems pretty durable.
Sometimes I forget it's in my pocket. It's got four card holders, I double stacked one and the one behind it I put my car insurance.

I've had this wallet for almost two years now and I love it. The design is great and the color is nice even though it's easy to see the money inside since the cover is a bit transparent. It's been holding up great ever since I got it so I definitely enjoy it. The inside pockets work well and I typically carry about 6-8 cards in it at a time alongside a couple dollar bills.
i like that this is wipeable/washable. purchased during pandemic. my husband had one and it’s hardly snowball wear in three years. arrived quickly. appearance consistent with picture.

The wallet is indeed quite thin, not magical thin but much slimmer than my old wallet. The teal colour version has a very plastic feeling, but I personally feel ok. Couldn't fill all non-US bills had to fold some of the larger ones. Can fit 8~10 cards easily, but if you don't place them nicely they might stop the wallet from folding properly. Overall I am very satisfy and hope it can last long.
Slim, lightweight and sturdy. Fits cash perfectly. Fits in pockets nicely, even women's pants! True to color as well.
Worth every penny.  Great build quality, have used for a few months now and it still appears new.
Great wallet, it's lighter than air and water resistant and a very tough wallet, holds all my cards with ease.
Perfect for my outdoor lifestyle. Keeps out moisture and condensation.

Exactly as advertised! I’m pleased with how thin the wallet is, and the us currency fits well in the bill compartment . Not sticking out like others have said. It is translucent on the rear so your outermost bill can be seen as shown in my photo. Not a big deal (I kind of like the look, but it’s not as private as some might prefer). They should add a photo like this to their listing so others can tell. Thanks for the great wallet!

Light weight and holds all of my stuff. Is actually less bulky than other styles of wallets cause the sail material is so thin. Plus it is waterproof basically made for anyone wants a light strong wallet! I see it lasting a long time.

I really like the slim,well made design. This wallet seems to have great function. However if someone is transferring from an existing wallet to a FlowFold, since it's so slim, if the user is attempting to fit MORE than maybe 4 or 5 cards it is going to be a tight fit. The wallet is still basically brand new to me so maybe it will 'stretch' a little with time and use. The material itself is sturdy and all of the seams appear to be fastened securely.

My husband owns this wallet but after several years of being overstuffed, it is wearing down. I bought him a new one and he couldn't have been happier because he LOVES this wallet. It is light and great for traveling and looks smart, too. Thanks for making such a great product!!
Slim, but not too slim to point it is useless.
This wallet is great.  It holds everything I need without all that extra crap that makes your wallet fat.  Its strong and keeps all my cards and cash right in place.
I ordered the cyan color, and it really fits everything I need, it appears to be very durable, and the bright color keeps me from misplacing it too easily.

评论概述: so sturdy, what the heck- 2.5 year update!!
评论详情: UPDATE: still in love with this wallet, I'm an extremely careless person and this wallet still looks brand new. I've dropped it in the toilet and had to (hand) wash it and the black didn't fade at all. The stitching is still perfect, nothing out of place. The plastic looks as good as the first day I used it. No stretching, nothing. Seriously in love with this thing and will continue to use it until either I or the wallet dies, we'll see which comes first! Very, very rarely am I impressed by a product, especially something off this dreaded site, but I love this stupid thing.  sturdy and cool-as-heck looking. money fits perfectly, debit card/license fit in the plastic perfectly, the wallet doesn't fold all weird if you have a ton of dollar bills in it. usually don't spend so much money on things, especially something like a wallet, but i am very happy with this purchase. only gripe is that the colored plastic on the outside is see-through, it isn't exactly obvious because of the lines going through the plastic but i feel weird subtly advertising my money.
Love this durable wallet! Looks great, lots of room, conversation piece. Still very slim. If it is strong enough to hold up to the kind of wind boats endure, this may last forever.
I love this wallet, my only grope is I wish the sail material was a bit darker or clouded to hide what is in th wallet. However, this wallet will take a beating

评论概述: I don't even like wallets. This wallet holds all I need it ...
评论详情: I don't even like wallets. This wallet holds all I need it to, and it's small enough that you don't notice it in your pocket. This is my second one, the first one lasted over three years.

I have the cyan version, neat how you can see the cash through the material.  Using it with 2 credit cards, drivers license, 5 other cards (insurance, medical etc.) and a magnetic card key.  This feels about right, you could easily add 2 more credit cards to the mix.
Love it! Compact just enough to have about 6 cards comfortably in my wallet!
I love these. I had the more streamlined minimalist wallet in the same color but it wasn't large enough to carry a laminated CPL.
The bomb
Super thin and light
Great  light super thin and strong wallet my second one. Love them..
Great
I love this wallet. It's slim and holds everything I need it to. It's bright and has been durable thus far.

Exactly what I wanted. Recently I had been thinking about making the switch to keeping my wallet in my front pocket but hesitated because my old wallet was massive. Yes it held everything I needed plus more but it was uncomfortable to keep in any pocket for long. So I shopped around and took a chance on Flowfold and it has exceed my expectations! I am still getting used to not being able to put anything I want into my wallet but I cannot see any reason why I would ever go back to anything bigger than this.

评论概述: It is a very slim profile and probably would not be good if you have a bunch of cards to carry ...
评论详情: I bought this for my son and he loves it.  It is a very slim profile and probably would not be good if you have a bunch of cards to carry but it's big enough for his drivers license and student id and cash.  He likes it because it's thin enough that he can carry it in his back pocket and it is still comfortable to sit on.  These wallets are practically indestructible.  My husband the wallet destroyer has been carrying his for a couple of years and it still looks brand new. (He has the trifold as he carries more cards.)
Love it perfect size, super light and appears to be super tough. carries everything I need and can easily fit in front or back pocket. super slim and light. Looks great too.

评论概述: See Through Wallet... Please Steal Me
评论详情: I love the color, but it's too small and it's see through. Basically every time you pull out the wallet, it's screaming how much money you have.  If you have money in the wallet it also changes the color of the outside  so it's not this awesome blue anymore. Too bad. If the wallet wasn't see through and slightly bigger, it'd be great.

评论概述: This is a great wallet. Lightweight and credit cards face inwards so ...
评论详情: This is a great wallet. Lightweight and credit cards face inwards so that there is no chance of them sliding out.
Very thin, just what I was looking for.

Kinda neat but not as nice as leather. Seam positioning and even logo tag make it thicker than it should be. Sharp corners can easily tear up your pockets so I slightly melted them into curves. Will probably give it to my nephew and get a nice leather wallet.

评论概述: It is very nice and light
评论详情: Lovely wallet.  It is very nice and light.  It does not have a lot of room, but I wanted a small and light wallet after getting tired of my large leather wallet.  I have had it for a couple of years now and it has held up quite well, with just a small amount of wear developing at the fold.  I use it to carry 4 cards and a few bills, and I would say that a few more cards could fit without stretching out the material.

评论概述: It is not the best slim wallet
评论详情: It really makes wallet slimmer but it feels cheap and there is clearly possibility to make wallet even slimmer. It is not the best slim wallet.

评论概述: I really like it. Just enough room for the essential cards ...
评论详情: This is my second one, I really like it. My first one wore out because I keep it in my front pocket with my keys. It still lasted quite a few years. I'll keep them separate this time. I also like that the red was marked down to $9.99 when I needed one. Perfect timing.
Super slim.  Looks really durable.  Way better than my prior leather wallet
was surprised to see that the cloth is transparent - so you can see the outer most bill.

评论概述: Just What I was looking for...
评论详情: I wanted a wallet that was thin, durable and functional. This meets the bill. PLUS IT'S MADE IN THE USA. The sailcloth seems durable and is pretty cool looking. I have found that I was able to transfer all of my essentials from my old bi-fold wallet into this with a third of the bulk. After 2 weeks of using in my back pocket, I can feel a difference in my back and hip... unexpected benefit of not sitting on a hockey puck all day. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS WALLET.  UPDATE: After several months of use my opinion of this product has only gone up. Would DEFINITELY buy again.
